Uses of Enum Class
generation.CardinalDirection

Packages that use CardinalDirection
Package
Description
generation
This package contains classes used in the generation and representation of a maze.
gui
This package contains classes to establish the GUI for the maze game.

    CardinalDirection
    Wallboard.getDirection()
    Provides the direction for the wallboard with regard to the internal position (x,y).
    CardinalDirection
    CardinalDirection.oppositeDirection()
    Gives the opposite direction which is the same as applying a 180 degree rotation.
    CardinalDirection
    CardinalDirection.randomDirection()
    Gives a random direction.
    CardinalDirection
    CardinalDirection.rotateClockwise()
    Gives the direction that results from a 90 degree clockwise rotation applied to the current direction.
